about.details:
Incorporated in 2014, Ashok Masala Mart Ltd is engaged in the manufacturing, exporting and supplying of Blended Spices, Whole spices and Grinded spices.

They sell their products under the two brand names "APPU MASALA" & "GAYATRI MASALA". They produce more than 30 types of Spices and Masalas like Pav Bhaji Masala, Chaat Masala, Tea Masala, Garam Masala, Sambhar Masala, Punjabi Chole Masala, Biryani/Pulav Masala, Kitchen King Masala and various Powders like Red Chilli Powder, Jeera Powder, White Pepper Powder, Turmeric Powder. They have in-house facility to execute all types of manufacturing activities such as cleaning, drying, grading, grinding, packaging, etc.

contactDetails.full_address: Ashok Masala Mart Ltd, 184/188 Mandvi Chamber Hazrat, Abbas Road Samuel street, Khoja Gully Chinchbunder Mumbai - 400009

faqs.question: What is the Ashok Masala IPO?
faqs.answer:
Ashok Masala IPO is a SME IPO of 2010000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹2.01 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹10 per share. The minimum order quantity is 10000.

The IPO opens on August 7, 2017, and closes on August 11, 2017.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Ashok Masala IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Ashok Masala IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Ashok Masala IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Ashok Masala IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Ashok Masala IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Ashok Masala IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Ashok Masala IPO opens on August 7, 2017 and closes on August 11, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Ashok Masala IPO?
faqs.answer: Ashok Masala IPO lot size is 10000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,00,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Ashok Masala IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Ashok Masala IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
